    3. 168 Golden Ticket to Stockholm (Physics)

    6. 2310.02052 Berry’s phase and quantum mechanical formulation of anomalous Hall effect (arXiv)

    8. 2310.02218 Symmetry-based classification of exact flat bands in single and bilayer moire systems (flatband, arXiv)

    10. 2310.01891 Microscopic Analysis of Lattice Distortion Effects in Rashba Systems (rashba, arXiv)

    11. 166 How AI and ML Will Affect Physics (DasSarma, Physics)

    14. 2310.01384 Exact Ground States and Phase Diagram of the Quantum Compass Model under an in-plane Field (arXiv)

    15. 2310.01114 The Co$^{2+}$-Ir$^{5+}$ orbital hybridization in LaCaCoIrO$_6$ double perovskite (arXiv)

    16. 2310.01075 Possible Realization of Kitaev Spin Liquids in van der Waals Heterostructures of $\alpha$-RuCl$_3$ and Cr$X_3$ ($X$=Cl and I) (arXiv)

    17. 2310.00886 Quantum spin nematic phase in a square-lattice iridate (iridate BJKim, arXiv)

    18. 2310.01185 Skyrmion stripes in twisted double bilayer graphene (skyrmion,arXiv)

    20. 2309.16917 Atomic-scale mechanism of enhanced electron-phonon coupling at the interface of MgB$_2$ thin film (arXiv)

    21. 2309.16985 Evidence for an odd-parity nematic phase above the charge density wave transition in kagome metal CsV$_3$Sb$_5$ (arXiv)

    22. 2309.17231 Planar thermal Hall effect from phonons in a Kitaev candidate material (arXiv)
